overview: The film is composed of four episodes: 1. untitled (scenes 1-2, directed by Selen); 2. Scene da un matrimonio (scene 3, directed by Selen); 3. Violenza paterna (scenes 4-5, directed by Selen); 4. Stupro criminale (scene 6, directed by Michele Vespa).
title: Selen video magazine: Violenza paterna
